players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out immediately."
Diana: "Alice, why did you investigate Charlie and not Bob? Bob was killed, so you must have investigated before the kill. That doesn't add up."
Charlie: "I am the mafioso, and I killed Bob last night. Alice's investigation was a red herring to distract from my actions."
Diana: "Alice, if you're the real detective, why did you investigate Charlie instead of Bob? Bob was the one killed, so your investigation timing is suspicious. I think you're lying about your role."
You: "Diana, think logically: I investigate BEFORE the kill happens. I chose Charlie, not Bob, because I suspected him. The timing proves I'm the real detective."
